name: Naturally Pure Castile Dish Soap
description:
100% Olive oil castile soap, so soft on your hands it makes an excellent hand soap and cleans dishes to a sparkle - dissolving grease and grime.

To use: Dissolve 1 teaspoon in your dish water.

Contains: 16 oz

Ingredients: water, saponified cold pressed olive oil (w/ retained glycerin)

Give the perfect gift to the customers who have everything and have us custom design the label for $5 per product or $20 for over 4 products.  

Gift wrapping available for no extra charge.

Customize the label and effortlessly launch your own cleaning line.  Gratitude sells the naturally pure line through a dedicated and ever expanding distribution network. We are always searching for great new distributors, if you are interested please contact us directly.

name: Men's & Women's Technical 3-in-1 Jacket
description:
Technical winter jacket with a removable fleece liner is designed with Waterproof, Breathable and Windproof fabric. Fully seam sealed and waterproof zippered chest pocket, removable zip off hood with adjustable drawcord and toggles. Elasticized cuffs with adjustable hook and loop closure, and adjustable drawcord and toggles at the waist for a snug personalized fit. 

FABRIC:Shell: 100% Polyester Full Dull Ottoman, Waterproof, Windproof, Breathable 
Liner: 100% Polyester Micro Poly Fleece, 250 gm/m2

FEATURES:
• Embroidery zipper with access to the back panel, and both the front left and right chest
• Easy access vertical zippered back vents to allow circulation
• Inside zippered pocket
• CD / MP3 player pocket and Cell phone pocket
• Plush fleece liner has nylon lined sleeves

SIZES: XS, S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL

COLOURS: CHILI / VINTAGE RED, NAUTICAL / BAY BLUE

Limited time pricing, regularly $169.80 each.

High volume discounts are available if ordering more than 100, please contact us directly for more details.

Free Embroidery.  Embossing/debossing & heat seal is also available, additional charges apply.

Someone will contact you shortly after placing your order to discuss the design and sizes needed.

name: Synergy Pen
description:
Product Details:
-  Unique peek-through design has a solid-coloured barrel with a translucent colour showing through on bottom of pen.  
-  Coordinating translucent trim encircles the plunger.
-  Click-action retractable plastic ballpoint offers two barrel colour choices and four bright translucent trim options.
- Chunky barrel is slightly contoured, giving the pen a nice shape.
-  Accented with a shiny silver pocket clip, plunger and pen tip.
-  Medium-point black ink is standard.

Colours: Barrel Colour/Translucent Accent Colour: grey/blue, grey/green, grey/orange, grey/red, white/blue, white/green, white/orange, white/red.

Personalize:
Your price includes a one-colour imprint on the barrel, opposite the clip.  Set-up charge: add $40.  Maximum number of imprint colours: 1.
Someone will contact you shortly after placing your order to discuss the design and colours needed.

Ordering Details:
Minimum Quanitity: 300.  High volume discounts are available if ordering more than 500, please contact us directly for more details.

name: Hampton Portfolio
description:
Hardcover journal with 100 sheets of lined paper. Insert pen through both pen loops to secure journal shut. Business card pockets. Includes 2-piece gift box.  Refills available.

Size: H 9.62" x W 0.87" x L 7.75"
Materials: Vinyl
Colours: Brown, Navy, Red

Personalize:
Price includes one colour silk screen in one location, set-up charge for debossing is $67.50 and for laser engraving, color printing or silk screening it is $59.40 for the entire order.
Someone will contact you shortly after placing your order to discuss the design.

Ordering Details:
Subject to availability.  High volume discounts are available if ordering more than 100, please contact us directly for more details.

Minimum Quantity: 24, or contact us for small quantities.

name: Chic Black Stripes Customizable Folded Note
description:
Express your appreciation and stand out from the crowd with note cards that personally build a relationship with your clients.

This card is a sample of the custom work we can do for you, email or phone us today and we will design your own sleek and sophisticated note card tailored to your business.

Handwriting services are available, just email us the details and we will complete your beautiful note card with a handwritten message and mail on your behalf.  We work around your schedule and needs, doing as much or as little to promote and show your appreciation.

Build loyalty with class and stretch your marketing dollars with cost efficient and personalized notes that will not be thrown away.

This card is printed on 100% post consumer fibre.

We will contact you shortly after placing your order to discuss the design or contact us and we will accept company cheque.

Minimum quanitity: 25 over any period of time.  If ordering less, a design charge of $15 applies.

Please note** This set includes your custom designed note card with a handwritten message and the personalized envelope hand addressed.  Regular or expedited postage is additional.  Regular postage for mailing within Canada is $0.54 per note and to the Unitied States it is $0.98.
